Items.question: Last Saturday, I joined the Flag-Selling Day. I woke up early __ the morning
_____ I had finished breakfast, I went to Tuen Mun Estate Centre
I went to Tuen Mun Estate Centre __ foot.
I collected some flags and a money bag _____ the staff of the centre.
At first, there were few people _____ the street since it was still early.
They put some coins _____ my money bag and I gave them a flag.
I stood in the street _____ three hours.
I felt very happy because the money would be given to people _____ need.
